member.name: T:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.GenericListAdaptor`1
member.summary: Reorderable list adaptor for generic list.

remarks.para: This adaptor can be subclassed to add special logic to item height calculation. You may want to implement a custom adaptor class where specialised functionality is needed.

member.name: T:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.IReorderableListAdaptor
member.summary: Adaptor allowing reorderable list control to interface with list data.

member.name: M:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.IReorderableListAdaptor.CanDrag(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether an item can be reordered by dragging mouse.

remarks.para: This should be a light-weight method since it will be used to determine whether grab handle should be included for each item in a reorderable list.
Please note that returning a value of false does not prevent movement on list item since other draggable items can be moved around it.

member.returns: A value of true if item can be dragged; otherwise /c>.

member.name: M:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.IReorderableListAdaptor.CanRemove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether an item can be removed from list.

remarks.para: This should be a light-weight method since it will be used to determine whether remove button should be included for each item in list.
This is redundant when is specified.

member.returns: A value of true if item can be removed; otherwise /c>.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListControl.defaultContextHandler
member.summary: Default functionality to handle context command.

example.para: Can be used when adding custom items to the context menu:
example.code: protected override void AddItemsToMenu(GenericMenu menu, int itemIndex, IReorderableListAdaptor adaptor) { var specialCommand = new GUIContent("Special Command"); menu.AddItem(specialCommand, false, defaultContextHandler, specialCommand); }

function AddItemsToMenu(menu:GenericMenu, itemIndex:int, list:IReorderableListAdaptor) { var specialCommand = new GUIContent('Special Command'); menu.AddItem(specialCommand, false, defaultContextHandler, specialCommand); }

member.name: M:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListControl.AddItemsToMenu(UnityEditor.GenericMenu,System.Int32,FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.IReorderableListAdaptor)
member.summary: Invoked to generate context menu for list item.
member.param: Zero-based index of item which was right-clicked.

member.name: M:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListControl.HandleCommand(System.String,System.Int32,FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.IReorderableListAdaptor)
member.summary: Invoked to handle context command.

remarks.para: It is important to set the value of GUI.changed to true if any changes are made by command handler.
Default command handling functionality can be inherited:

member.param: Name of command. This is the text shown in the context menu.
Zero-based index of item which was right-clicked.
member.returns: A value of true if command was known; otherwise /c>.

remarks.para: Warning message is logged to console if attempted to execute unknown command.

Zero-based index of item which was right-clicked.

member.summary: Additional flags which can be passed into reorderable list field.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.DisableReordering
member.summary: Hide grab handles and disable reordering of list items.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.HideAddButton
member.summary: Hide add button at base of control.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.HideRemoveButtons
member.summary: Hide remove buttons from list items.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.DisableContextMenu
member.summary: Do not display context menu upon right-clicking grab handle.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.DisableDuplicateCommand
member.summary: Hide "Duplicate" option from context menu.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.DisableAutoFocus
member.summary: Do not automatically focus first control of newly added items.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.ShowIndices
member.summary: Show zero-based index of array elements.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags.DisableClipping
member.summary: Do not attempt to clip items which are out of view.

remarks.para: Clipping helps to boost performance, though may lead to issues on some interfaces.

member.name: P:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListGUI.indexOfChangedItem
member.summary: Gets or sets zero-based index of last item which was changed. A value of -1 indicates that no item was changed by list.

remarks.para: This property should not be set when items are added or removed.

member.name: P:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListGUI.currentItemIndex
member.summary: Gets zero-based index of list item which is currently being drawn; or a value of -1 if no item is currently being drawn.

member.name: T:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.Internal.ReorderableListResources
member.summary: Resources to assist with reorderable list control.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.Internal.ReorderableListResources.s_LightSkin
member.summary: Resource assets for light skin.

remarks.para: Resource assets are PNG images which have been encoded using a base-64 string so that actual asset files are not necessary.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.Internal.ReorderableListResources.s_DarkSkin
member.summary: Resource assets for dark skin.

remarks.para: Resource assets are PNG images which have been encoded using a base-64 string so that actual asset files are not necessary.

member.summary: Generate special textures.

member.summary: Create 1x1 pixel texture of specified color.
member.returns: The new Texture2D instance.

member.name: M:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.Internal.ReorderableListResources.LoadResourceAssets
member.summary: Read textures from base-64 encoded strings. Automatically selects assets based upon whether the light or dark (pro) skin is active.

member.name: T:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.SerializedPropertyAdaptor
member.summary: Reorderable list adaptor for serialized array property.

remarks.para: This adaptor can be subclassed to add special logic to item height calculation. You may want to implement a custom adaptor class where specialised functionality is needed.

member.name: F:FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.SerializedPropertyAdaptor.fixedItemHeight
member.summary: Fixed height of each list item.

remarks.para: Non-zero value overrides property drawer height calculation which is more efficient.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .
member.param: Non-zero height overrides property drawer height calculation.
